::Battera::

She sighed. "I'm a Predacon on a peace mission.  I was instructed to 
come here and invite the leader to a peace conference.  Please 
beleive me, I have left most of my weapons behind. I am olny here to 
talk."  She didn't move. She sighed again.
"Could you at least take me to the Maximal leader?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Chordate:
> 
> 
> Chordate kept his laser rifle aimed at the back of Battera's head.  
> "What is your faction?  And I wouldn't try getting through the 
shields, or 
> you'll be fried, and all weapons will blow your remains into the 
grass."
> 
> Chordate activated his comm. unit on his chest, speaking aloud.
> "Are there ANY Maximals in the Cybertronian Fire, I repeat, any 
Maximals in 
> the Cybertronian Fire?"
> 
> ---
> 
> Smokescreen awoke, hearing Chordate.
> "Smokescreen here." The Maximal said into his comm. unit.
> 
> ~Meet me near the main access hatch.  I've got a possible intruder~
> 
> Smokescreen acknowledged, getting out of his quarters quickly.
